en.title: [Dec 2024] Wholesale & Retail Trade
en.description: Monthly wholesale and retail trade performance, including the performance of motor vehicle sales.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest monthly wholesale and retail trade data, covering sales turnover and volume. Wholesale and retail sales turnover grew by 5.7% year-on-year (Nov 2024: 4.7%), while sales volume grew by 4.4% (Nov 2024: 3.9%).

resources.resource_name: Index of Wholesale & Retail Trade: Dec 2024
Index of Wholesale & Retail Trade: Dec 2024

bm.title: [Dis 2024] Perdagangan Borong & Runcit
bm.description: Prestasi bulanan perdagangan borong dan runcit, termasukan prestasi jualan kenderaan bermotor.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data perdagangan borong dan runcit bulanan terkini, merangkumi nilai dan volum penjualan. Nilai penjualan borong dan runcit meningkat sebanyak 5.7% secara tahunan (Nov 2024: 4.7%), manakala volum penjualan meningkat sebanyak 4.4% (Nov 2024: 3.9%).
